title: The Best Amazon Big Spring Sale K-Beauty Deals to Shop Now
description: Save up to 66 percent on Cosrx, Medicube, Biodance, and more.
excerpt: Save up to 66 percent on Cosrx, Medicube, Biodance, and more.
text: One of the best things about K-beauty is that it’s usually super affordable—especially in South Korea. If you visit a store like Olive Young in the country, you’ll discover that these top-tier, innovative formulas are cheaper and come at major discounts with plenty of free samples. There are a few times a year when those of us in the U.S. can get a taste of that high, and one of those occasions is finally here: The Amazon Big Spring Sale. For the next few days—March 25 to 31, to be exact—beauty shoppers will be able to grab their Korean makeup and Korean skin care essentials for up to a whopping 66 percent off. Since you’ve landed on this page, you’re either already a K-beauty connoisseur or have a hankering to dive into the world of Korean face masks, Korean moisturizers, Korean sunscreens, and more. There is a lot to choose from, and even as a Korean beauty writer, I haven’t been able to try everything. However, I’ve personally tested dozens of products, spoken to many K-beauty experts, and have done my research, so you can rest assured that the products below were thoughtfully selected and worth picking up, whether they’re on sale or not. Many of them are already on sale, so I suggest that you load up your cart to beat out the countless other savvy K-beauty shoppers waiting to check out. Korean Lip ProductsI may be a little biased, but Korean lip products almost always deliver high-end formulas, even when they’re sold at more affordable price points. Fan favorites like the Fwee Blurry Pudding Pot + Keychain Set (32 percent off) and the Laneige Lip Glowy Balm (20 percent off) are worth stocking up on.Laneige Lip Glowy BalmFwee Blurry Pudding Pot + Keychain SetNow 20% OffHera Sensual Nude Lip Gloss Peripera Ink the Velvet Lip TintNow 29% OffKorean MoisturizersEven the most basic skin care routine needs a moisturizer, and you can’t go wrong with a Korean one. A selection of beauty editor go-tos, like Belif’s The True Cream Aqua Bomb and the Etude House SoonJung 2x Barrier Intensive Cream, will be up to 40 percent off. Aestura A-Cica 365 Calmimg CreamBelif The True Cream Aqua BombCredit: BelifEtude House SoonJung 2x Barrier Intensive CreamNow 24% OffIlliyoon Ceramide Ato Concentrate CreamNow 20% OffKorean SerumsIf you want to step up your skin care game, incorporating a solid serum or two is an easy way to do it. For example, the d’Alba Piedmont Italian White Truffle First Spray Serum and its ability to give you instant glass skin went viral on TikTok recently, and Korean women love Cosrx’s The 6 Peptide Skin Booster Serum for boosting moisture as well as plumping and firming. Medicube PDRN Pink Peptide SerumCosrx The 6 Peptide Skin Booster SerumNow 28% OffPrimera Youth Radiance Vitatinol SerumNow 16% Offd’Alba Piedmont Italian White Truffle First Spray SerumKorean Face MasksIf you trace the history of sheet masks, the South Korean beauty industry was the one that really popularized and innovated within the category. Those skin care brands are constantly churning out new-and-improved masks with even better ingredients and formulas, and several of them will be on sale, including our favorite Korean collagen face masks (like the Biodance one!).Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep MaskHanyul Yuja Vita Tone Up PadsNumbuzin NAD+ BIO Lifting-sil Full Face MaskNow 30% OffMedicube Salmon DNA PDRN Pink Collagen Jelly Gel MaskKorean SunscreensIf I’m testing a sunscreen and it irritates my skin or pills under my makeup, I know that I can always go back to my Korean favorites. The Big Spring Sale is full of discounts on excellent choices like the Etude Sunprise Mild Airy Finish Sun Milk SPF50+ (30 percent off) and the d’Alba Piedmont UV Essence Waterfull+ Sunscreen (61 percent off). html:
One of the best things about K-beauty is that it’s usually super affordable—especially in South Korea. If you visit a store like Olive Young in the country, you’ll discover that these top-tier, innovative formulas are cheaper and come at major discounts with plenty of free samples. There are a few times a year when those of us in the U.S. can get a taste of that high, and one of those occasions is finally here: The Amazon Big Spring Sale. For the next few days—March 25 to 31, to be exact—beauty shoppers will be able to grab their Korean makeup and Korean skin care essentials for up to a whopping 66 percent off.

Since you’ve landed on this page, you’re either already a K-beauty connoisseur or have a hankering to dive into the world of Korean face masks, Korean moisturizers, Korean sunscreens, and more. There is a lot to choose from, and even as a Korean beauty writer, I haven’t been able to try everything. However, I’ve personally tested dozens of products, spoken to many K-beauty experts, and have done my research, so you can rest assured that the products below were thoughtfully selected and worth picking up, whether they’re on sale or not. Many of them are already on sale, so I suggest that you load up your cart to beat out the countless other savvy K-beauty shoppers waiting to check out.

Korean Lip Products

I may be a little biased, but Korean lip products almost always deliver high-end formulas, even when they’re sold at more affordable price points. Fan favorites like the Fwee Blurry Pudding Pot + Keychain Set (32 percent off) and the Laneige Lip Glowy Balm (20 percent off) are worth stocking up on.

Laneige Lip Glowy Balm

Fwee Blurry Pudding Pot + Keychain Set

Now 20% Off

Hera Sensual Nude Lip Gloss

Peripera Ink the Velvet Lip Tint

Now 29% Off

Korean Moisturizers

Even the most basic skin care routine needs a moisturizer, and you can’t go wrong with a Korean one. A selection of beauty editor go-tos, like Belif’s The True Cream Aqua Bomb and the Etude House SoonJung 2x Barrier Intensive Cream, will be up to 40 percent off.

Aestura A-Cica 365 Calmimg Cream

Belif The True Cream Aqua Bomb

Etude House SoonJung 2x Barrier Intensive Cream

Now 24% Off

Illiyoon Ceramide Ato Concentrate Cream

Now 20% Off

Korean Serums

If you want to step up your skin care game, incorporating a solid serum or two is an easy way to do it. For example, the d’Alba Piedmont Italian White Truffle First Spray Serum and its ability to give you instant glass skin went viral on TikTok recently, and Korean women love Cosrx’s The 6 Peptide Skin Booster Serum for boosting moisture as well as plumping and firming.

Medicube PDRN Pink Peptide Serum

Cosrx The 6 Peptide Skin Booster Serum

Now 28% Off

Primera Youth Radiance Vitatinol Serum

Now 16% Off

d’Alba Piedmont Italian White Truffle First Spray Serum

Korean Face Masks

If you trace the history of sheet masks, the South Korean beauty industry was the one that really popularized and innovated within the category. Those skin care brands are constantly churning out new-and-improved masks with even better ingredients and formulas, and several of them will be on sale, including our favorite Korean collagen face masks (like the Biodance one!).

Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask

Hanyul Yuja Vita Tone Up Pads

Numbuzin NAD+ BIO Lifting-sil Full Face Mask

Now 30% Off

Medicube Salmon DNA PDRN Pink Collagen Jelly Gel Mask

Korean Sunscreens

If I’m testing a sunscreen and it irritates my skin or pills under my makeup, I know that I can always go back to my Korean favorites. The Big Spring Sale is full of discounts on excellent choices like the Etude Sunprise Mild Airy Finish Sun Milk SPF50+ (30 percent off) and the d’Alba Piedmont UV Essence Waterfull+ Sunscreen (61 percent off).

Etude Sunprise Mild Airy Finish Sun Milk SPF50+

Cosrx Vitamin E Vitalizing Sunscreen SPF 50

Now 11% Off

Tonymoly Green Tea SPF 50 Sunscreen

d'Alba Piedmont UV Essence Waterfull+ Sunscreen

Other K-Beauty Favorites

K-beauty extends beyond makeup and skin care—some of the best tools I own are from Korea, and I’ve had multiple people tell me that the Mise En Scene hair serum is their holy grail. Also, Longtake’s solid perfumes are enticingly unique; the clear gel comes in a squeezable bottle, and the scent will stay with you all day long. If you love creamy sandalwood fragrances, try the one I’ve linked here.

Medicube Age-R Booster Pro

Knemo Right Away Thincognito Invisible Spot Patch

Mise En Scene Perfect Serum Original

Now 33% Off

Longtake Sandalwood Solid Perfume
